Windlord::

He follow Perplex.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Perplex: Look, it's okay! Besides, look now! Serge has been taken 
care of,
> there's no need to worry anymore. So let's just go back to the 
base, now,
> okay?
> 
> Serge raised up as much as he could and fired at Perplex, knocking 
him to
> the ground.
> 
> Serge: Imperitent fools, you should have known you could not defeat 
someone
> with the power and intelligence of myself, you will regret the day 
you even
> knew I existed! If there's one thing I learned from Deemos it's 
when to
> attack when they least expect it! And I taught myself how to hide 
one's
> identity until the real personality is fit to escape! You have 
ruined my
> plans, my beautiful plans to conquer and rule, and create a world 
filled
> with nothingness! And now you die!
> 
> Serge aimed at Windlord, but died before he could fire. Perplex 
flipped back
> to his feet.
> 
> Perplex: What was that about?
> 
> Perplex looked to Serge. Throughout all of his history, Serge was 
the stupid
> one, the one who never spoke and the one who always tried to be 
helpful. The
> crazy one, but never the wily one.
> 
> Perplex: I guess we should go home now.
> 
> Someone coughs and Perplex looks back at Serge. Serge was still 
dead.
> Perplex starts walking back towards the base...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...>

> 
> > Windlord::
> >
> > "It was my fault" said the male "I.. shouldn't have shot... I"
